modName: Twitch Streamer Support Pack for Darkness Falls Mod
modShortDescription: Added several contents for Twitch streamer who are playing Darkness Falls Mod.
modDescription:
Added several contents for Twitch streamer who are playing [Darkness Falls Mod](https://7daystodiemods.com/darkness-falls-mod/).

## Contents

Added Twitch integration commands for Darkness Falls Mod. Added Special supply box for Darkness Falls Mod.

* #supply\_gachabox: Free supply box to streamer once a day. There are 7 of rarity.
* #survivor: Spawn survivors. They maybe or may not be helped youâ€¦
* #minihorde Tier1 to 6: Spawn zombie waves. Zombie waves maybe increased depends on your game stage.

## Future Updates

* Review/Update Twitch integration commands
* Review/Update Special supply box

**Please Note:** Mini Horde Tier2 to 6 are disabled by default. Please streamer enable them if needed.

**[Download](https://github.com/7DaystoDie-JP/Twitch_Streamer_Support_Pack_for_Darkness_Falls_Mod/archive/refs/heads/main.zip)**

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://discord.gg/bdW6msJ6M2).

**Credits:** [7 Days to Die Gaming Community Japan](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-gaming-community-japan/)
